alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Colquitt; Cook; Lowndes; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 3:52PM EDT until July 09 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Cook County in south central Georgia... Northwestern Lowndes County in south central Georgia... Northeastern Thomas County in south central Georgia... Northern Brooks County in south central Georgia... Colquitt County in south central Georgia... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 351 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Doerun to 7 miles northeast of Boston, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Moultrie, Adel, Valdosta, Hahira, Sparks, Omega, Norman Park, Doerun, Pavo, Coolidge, Riverside, Schley, Morven, Berlin, Funston, Barwick, Cecil, Ellenton, Reed Bingham State Park and Greggs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
